title: Introduction to prestressed concrete
brief_description: Prestressing, by the introduction of steel bars or cables under high tension into liquid concrete, has revolutionised concrete construction. Shows the difference between pre-tensioning and post-tensioning, and production techniques in the factory and on the site.
